    @allure.title("Validate the audit logs details for when update the active residue detail of inspection")
    @allure.description(
        "This test case test API to validate the audit logs details for when update the active residue"
        "detail of inspection")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86cw2cpm7")
    @pytest.mark.validate_updated_active_residue_detail_inspection_audit_logs_details
    def test_validate_updated_active_residue_detail_inspection_audit_logs_details(self):
        inspection = self.inspection_multi_production_protocol._update_single_active_residue_verification_details_inspection(
            self.inspection_multi_production_protocol.inspection_setup())
        time_stamp = datetime.utcnow().isoformat()
        payload_details = inspection["update_inspection_payload"]["residues"][0]
        formatted_date = self.validate_audit_logs.formate_date_iso(payload_details["sampleTakenOn"])
        audit_logs_details = self.validate_audit_logs.audit_logs_details(policy_name="OnDemandInspection",
                                                                         action=const.LOG_ACTION_MODIFY)
        below_detection_limit = payload_details["belowDetectionLimit"]
    
        for index, result in enumerate(audit_logs_details.get("audit_logs", {}).get("result", [])):
            response_time_stamp = result.get("timestamp")
            action_exists = result.get("action") is not None
            domain_is_additional_policy = result.get("domain") == "OnDemandInspection"
            audit_diff = result.get("diff", {})
    
            if audit_diff.get("ID", {}).get("data", {}).get("old", {}).get("value") == inspection[
                'inspection_external_id']:
                if action_exists and domain_is_additional_policy:
                    self.validate_audit_logs.assert_inspection_diff(audit_diff, const.SAMPLE_TAKEN_BY, None,
                                                                    "Admin User (Id: admin)")
>                   self.validate_audit_logs.assert_inspection_diff(audit_diff, const.SAMPLE_TAKEN_ON, None,
                                                                    formatted_date)
